languages.text: "Аборигены Айона-VI — заблудшие души, которым нужен пастырь... или погонщик. Я — священник Экклезиархии. Я умею внушать трепет перед Императором. Разными способами".

traits.locale_text: "Аборигены Айона-VI — заблудшие души, которым нужен пастырь... или погонщик. Я — священник Экклезиархии. Я умею внушать трепет перед Императором. Разными способами".

languages.text: "The natives of Aion VI are lost souls in need of a shepherd's crook... or a whip. I am a priest of the Ecclesiarchy. I know how to instil reverence for the Emperor. There are many ways."
languages.original_text: "Аборигены Айона-VI — заблудшие души, которым нужен пастырь... или погонщик. Я — священник Экклезиархии. Я умею внушать трепет перед Императором. Разными способами".

traits.locale_text: "The natives of Aion-VI are lost souls in need of a shepherd's crook... or a whip. I am a priest of the Ecclesiarchy. I know how to instil reverence for the Emperor. There are many ways."
"The natives of Aion-VI are lost souls in need of a shepherd's crook... or a whip. I am a priest of the Ecclesiarchy. I know how to instil reverence for the Emperor. There are many ways."
"The natives of Aion VI are lost souls in need of a shepherd's crook... or a whip. I am a priest of the Ecclesiarchy. I know how to instil reverence for the Emperor. There are many ways."
"The natives of Aion VI are lost souls in need of a shepherd's crook... or a whip. I am a priest of the Ecclesiarchy. I know how to instil reverence for the Emperor. There are many ways."
"The natives of Aion VI are lost souls in need of a shepherd's crook... or a whip. I am a priest of the Ecclesiarchy. I know how to instil reverence for the Emperor. There are many ways."

languages.text: “艾恩六号星的土著都是迷途的羔羊，他们需要牧羊人的牧杖……或鞭子。我是国教的牧师，我知道如何灌输对帝皇的崇敬。我有很多方法可以实现这个目的。”
languages.original_text: "The natives of Aion VI are lost souls in need of a shepherd's crook... or a whip. I am a priest of the Ecclesiarchy. I know how to instil reverence for the Emperor. There are many ways."

traits.locale_text: “艾恩六号星的土著都是迷途的羔羊，他们需要牧羊人的牧杖……或鞭子。我是国教的牧师，我知道如何灌输对帝皇的崇敬。我有很多方法可以实现这个目的。”

languages.text: «Los nativos de Aion VI son almas perdidas en busca del cayado del pastor... o de su látigo. Soy sacerdot{mf|e|isa} de la Eclesiarquía. Sé infundir reverencia al Emperador. De diferentes maneras».
languages.original_text: "The natives of Aion VI are lost souls in need of a shepherd's crook... or a whip. I am a priest of the Ecclesiarchy. I know how to instil reverence for the Emperor. There are many ways."

traits.locale_text: «Los nativos de Aion VI son almas perdidas en busca del cayado del pastor... o de su látigo. Soy sacerdot{mf|e|isa} de la Eclesiarquía. Sé infundir reverencia al Emperador. De diferentes maneras».

languages.text: 「アイオン・VIの原住民は、羊飼いのつえ…または鞭を必要とする迷える魂たちです。私は帝国聖教会の司祭であり、皇帝への敬意を植え付ける方法を知っています。様々なやり方がありますよ」
languages.original_text: "The natives of Aion VI are lost souls in need of a shepherd's crook... or a whip. I am a priest of the Ecclesiarchy. I know how to instil reverence for the Emperor. There are many ways."

traits.locale_text: 「アイオン・VIの原住民は、羊飼いのつえ…または鞭を必要とする迷える魂たちです。私は帝国聖教会の司祭です。皇帝への敬意を植え付ける方法を知っています。たくさんのやり方がありますよ」
「アイオン・VIの原住民は、羊飼いのつえ…または鞭を必要とする迷える魂たちです。私は帝国聖教会の司祭であり、皇帝への敬意を植え付ける方法を知っています。様々なやり方がありますよ」

languages.text: « Les habitants d'Éon-VI sont des âmes égarées en quête du bâton d'un berger... ou d'un fouet. En tant que {mf|prêtre|prêtresse} de l'Ecclésiarchie, je sais comment inculquer la déférence envers l'Empereur. Il existe bien des façons de le faire. »
languages.original_text: "The natives of Aion VI are lost souls in need of a shepherd's crook... or a whip. I am a priest of the Ecclesiarchy. I know how to instil reverence for the Emperor. There are many ways."

traits.locale_text: « Les habitants d'Éon-VI sont des âmes égarées en quête du bâton d'un berger... ou d'un fouet. En tant que {mf|prêtre|prêtresse} de l'Ecclésiarchie, je sais comment inculquer la déférence envers l'Empereur. Il existe bien des façons de le faire. »

languages.text: "Die Einheimischen auf Aion VI sind verlorene Seelen, die einen Hirtenstab benötigen ... oder eine Peitsche. Ich bin {mf|ein Priester|eine Priesterin} der Ekklesiarchie. Ich weiß, wie man Verehrung für den Imperator verankert. Es gibt viele Wege."
languages.original_text: "The natives of Aion VI are lost souls in need of a shepherd's crook... or a whip. I am a priest of the Ecclesiarchy. I know how to instil reverence for the Emperor. There are many ways."

traits.locale_text: "Die Einheimischen auf Aion VI sind verlorene Seelen, die einen Hirtenstab benötigen ... oder eine Peitsche. Ich bin {mf|ein Priester|eine Priesterin} der Ekklesiarchie. Ich weiß, wie man Verehrung für den Imperator verankert. Es gibt viele Wege."

languages.text: "Belli ki Aion VI'nın yerlilerine bir çobanın değneği... Ya da kırbaç gerek. Ben Ekleşiarşi rahibiyim. Yüreklere İmparator saygı sevgisini nasıl aşılayacağımı iyi bilirim. Bunun birçok yolu mevcut."
languages.original_text: "The natives of Aion VI are lost souls in need of a shepherd's crook... or a whip. I am a priest of the Ecclesiarchy. I know how to instil reverence for the Emperor. There are many ways."

traits.locale_text: "Belli ki Aion VI'nın yerlilerine bir çobanın değneği... Ya da kırbaç gerek. Ben Ekleşiarşi rahibiyim. Yüreklere İmparator saygı sevgisini nasıl aşılayacağımı iyi bilirim. Bunun birçok yolu mevcut."
